infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allows FarmGuard Maintenance to access photos you select from your library to attach to maintenance records, such as choosing an existing photo of equipment or a repair.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allows FarmGuard Maintenance to save maintenance photos to your photo library, such as saving a photo of equipment or a completed repair for your personal records.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FarmGuard Maintenance uses the camera to take photos of equipment and maintenance work, which are attached to maintenance records (for example, photographing a tractor, combine, damaged part, or completed repair while servicing equipment).

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
